metadata.title: CVE-2023-5841 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to a failure in validating the number of scanline samples of a OpenEXRfile containing deep scanline data, Academy Software FoundationOpenEXÂ image parsing library version 3.2.1 and prior is susceptible to aheap-based buffer overflow vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
